Title: La mano en la trampa
Writer: Beatriz Guido (novel), Beatriz Guido (screenplay), Ricardo Luna, Ricardo Muñoz Suay, Leopoldo Torre Nilsson
Actors: Elsa Daniel, Francisco Rabal, Leonardo Favio, María Rosa Gallo
Plot: A woman uncovers the secret of her aunt's withdrawal from the world and arranges a confrontation with the man who jilted her.
